00064             function                __construct()
00065             {
00066                   try
00067                   {
00068                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00069                         $this->DatabaseAlgorithms = get_package( 'database::database_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00070                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00071                   }
00072                   catch( Exception $e )
00073                   {
00074                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00075                   }
00076             }

00088             var                           $AddLimitations = '1 = 1';
00089             
00108             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00109             {
00110                   try
00111                   {
00112                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00113                         {
00114                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00115                         }
00116                         else
00117                         {
00118                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00119                         }
00120                   }
00121                   catch( Exception $e )
00122                   {
00123                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00124                   }
00125             }

00149             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00150             {
00151                   try
00152                   {
00153                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00154                         
00155                         $Records = $this->Database->select( 
00156                               '* , code AS preview , IF( shows , ( 100 * clicks / shows ) , 0 ) AS ctr' , 
00157                               $this->NativeTable , 
00158                               "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition"
00159                         );
00160                         
00161                         foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
00162                         {
00163                               set_field( 
00164                                     $Records[ $k ] , 'preview' , $this->Security->get( get_field( $v , 'code' ) , 'unsafe_string' )
00165                               );
00166                         }
00167                         
00168                         return( $Records );
00169                   }
00170                   catch( Exception $e )
00171                   {
00172                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00173                   }
00174             }
00175             
00214             function                select( $Start = false , $Limit = false , $Field = false , $Order = false , 
00215                                                                                                                                                 $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00216             {
00217                   try
00218                   {
00219                         $Condition = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->select_condition( 
00220                               $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order , $Condition
00221                         );
00222                         
00223                         return( $this->unsafe_select( $Condition ) );
00224                   }
00225                   catch( Exception $e )
00226                   {
00227                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00228                   }
00229             }
00230             
00253             function                create( $Record )
00254             {
00255                   try
00256                   {
00257                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00258                               $Record , 'campaign_id:integer,allow_not_set,default_0;code:string'
00259                         );
00260                         
00261                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00262 
00263                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00264                         
00265                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00266                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_ad_banner' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00267                         
00268                         return( $id );
00269                   }
00270                   catch( Exception $e )
00271                   {
00272                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00273                   }
00274             }

00294             function                delete( $id )
00295             {
00296                   try
00297                   {
00298                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00299                         
00302                         $this->Database->delete( $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )" );
00303                         $this->Database->commit();
00304                   }
00305                   catch( Exception $e )

00365             function                simple_select()
00366             {
00367                   try
00368                   {
00369                         $Records = $this->unsafe_select( '1 = 1' );
00370                         
00371                         foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
00372                         {
00373                               $Records[ $k ]->title = '{lang:ad_code} '.$v->code;
00374                         }
00375                         
00376                         return( $Records );
00377                   }
00378                   catch( Exception $e )
00379                   {
00380                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00381                   }

00406             function                update( $id , $Record )
00407             {
00408                   try
00409                   {
00410                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00411                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00412                               $Record , 'campaign_id:integer,default_0;code:string' , 'allow_not_set'
00413                         );
00414                         
00415                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00416                         
00417                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00418                         {
00419                               $this->Database->update( 
00420                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00421                               );
00422                               $this->Database->commit();
00423                         }
00424                   }
00425                   catch( Exception $e )
00426                   {
00427                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00428                   }
00429             }
